scenarios.name: Graphics Makers Inc. Chip Adoption
scenarios.description: Graphics Makers Inc. is selling more chips than expected.
scenarios.openingStatement: I’ve been watching GPU Makers Inc. closely. Their graphics chips are everywhere in gaming and AI. What do you think of their stock?

newspaper: GPU Makers Inc. earnings report 3x higher than expected.

call.message: Great call! The adoption of their new graphics chips has been a huge success!

put.message: Ouch! Graphics Makers Inc. exceeded expectations. You missed out on big gains.

hold.message: Smart to wait and see. Graphics Makers Inc. did well, but you avoided the risk.

scenarios.name: Terrafuel Regulations
scenarios.description: TerraFuel Corp. is facing new regulations.
scenarios.openingStatement: TerraFuel Corp. has been on my radar. But I heard some news about regulations…

newspaper: Congress passes sweeping fossil fuel regulations.

call.message: Bad timing! TerraFuel Corp. stock tanked due to the regulations.

put.message: Excellent foresight! TerraFuel Corp. stock plummeted and you made a killing on the put!

hold.message: Wise decision to stay out. TerraFuel Corp. stock has been plummeting, but you could have predicted it and made a profit.

scenarios.name: Frosty Treats Can't Meet Demand
scenarios.openingStatement: Everyone I know is crazy about Frosty Treats’ quadruple chocolate deluxe. I want to invest before summer hits.

wordOfMouth: All my friends go to Frosty Treats for that chocolate dessert.
newspaper: Global cocoa shortage sends chocolate prices skyrocketing.

call.message: Wrong call! The cocoa shortage sent Frosty Treats stock plummeting.

put.message: Nice choice! The cocoa shortage made it impossible for Frosty Treats to meet demand.

hold.message: Conservative play. The cocoa shortage made it impossible for Frosty Treats to meet demand.

scenarios.name: Code Logic Systems announces layoffs
scenarios.openingStatement: I’m not sure about CodeLogic Systems. They just made a big announcement

wordOfMouth: A friend I know just got laid off from there.
newspaper: CodeLogic Systems announces massive layoffs after overestimating growth.

call.message: Bad Choice! The layoffs hurt the stock price!

put.message: Nice job! The layoffs hurt CodeLogic and ruined predictions

hold.message: Conservative play. Layoffs are unpredictable in the market.

scenarios.name: AeroMotors vs. SteelDrive
scenarios.openingStatement: I’ve heard AeroMotors is struggling, and SteelDrive is on the rise. What should I do about AeroMotors?

wordOfMouth: Older models are fine, but the new ones are a disaster.
newspaper: AeroMotors recalls vehicles due to crucial malfunctions.

call.message: Terrible decision. It was proven that AeroMotors was falling apart.

put.message: Good job! The recalls really hurt AeroMotors.

hold.message: Not the best choice. This was a guaranteed win.

scenarios.name: NovaTech Accounting Scandal
scenarios.description: NovatTech has been lying about their profits
scenarios.openingStatement: NovaTech’s been in trouble for scandals. But they just announced major growth. What do I do?

wordOfMouth: Didn’t NovaTech just get caught fudging profits?
newspaper: NovaTech introduces new product despite accounting controversy.

call.message: Phenomenal play! Looks like NovaTech learned their lesson. Profits went up!

put.message: Tough choice. The profits rose in spite of the controversy.

hold.message: Way to play it safe. The stock rose, but it was hard to tell.

scenarios.name: AgriTech releases new harvester
scenarios.openingStatement: AgriTech just released a new harvester. A lot of farmers are using it.

wordOfMouth: My farming buddy says it breaks down constantly.
newspaper: AgriTech’s new harvester dominates market, but complaints rising.

call.message: Wrong call! Looks like the complaints were valid of the combines!.

put.message: Great work! The complaints really lead to a drop in stock price

hold.message: Conservative play. AgriTech stocks went down, but not by much.

scenarios.name: Zenith Corp changes CEOs
scenarios.openingStatement: Zenith Corp. keeps swapping CEOs, but their numbers look okay this quarter.

wordOfMouth: They change leaders every year… but this CEO seems more stable.

call.message: Nice Move! The new CEO has major potential. I think Zenith Corp found what they needed.

put.message: Not a good choice The CEO makes big promises, the stock price increases with new hopes.

hold.message: You held which was the safe choice, but there was money to be made
